title: iMac M3 24" Teardown: Apple’s Most Replaceable Battery?
introduction:
This teardown is not a repair guide. To repair your iMac M3 24", use our service manual.

Repairability is not good, hard disk is impossible to swap, ram the same, screen is glued to back panels,

videos.title: M3 iMac Teardown: Apple’s Most Replaceable Battery?
